summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1262, for the improvement of Galer Street, from Seventh Avenue West to Queen Anne Avenue; Queen Anne, from Galer Street to Ray Street; and Third Avenue West, from Galer Street to Blaine Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, etc., under Ordinance No. 13885 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
